import React, {useState, useContext, useEffect} from "react" import axios from 'axios' import {UserContext} from "../context/UserProvider"; import Header from './Header'; import FooterNavbar from "./FooterNavbar"; import AccountCircleIcon from '@material-ui/icons/AccountCircle'; import AttachMoneyIcon from '@material-ui/icons/AttachMoney'; import StarsIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Stars'; const userAxios = axios.create() userAxios.interceptors.request.use(config => { const token = localStorage.getItem("token") config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}` return config }) const UserProfile = () => { const { user: { firstName, avatar, team }, logout} = useContext(UserContext) const [teamInfo, setTeamInfo] = useState({}) function getTeamInfo(){ userAxios.get(`/api/team/${team}`) .then(res => setTeamInfo(res.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } useEffect(() => { getTeamInfo() }, []) return ( <>

Team {teamInfo.name}

Welcome, @{firstName}!

${teamInfo.currency}

Total Points: {teamInfo.points}

*1st

Team Members

Coach

Name

< AccountCircleIcon style={{ color: "gray",height: "40px", width: "40px"}} />

) } export default UserProfile
